description:
Maka and Soul continue their search for Medusa’s lair. Meanwhile, a clash with the creepy guardians of the final Magic Tool leaves Death the Kid even more suspicious of his father’s true motives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ultimo artefatto demoniaco. Mission Impossible per un Kid disarmato?
Le dernier artefact ! Mission impossible pour un Kid désarmé ?
Saigo no Madougu: Bukinashi Kid no Mission Impossible?
The Last Magic Tool: Mission Impossible for Unarmed Kid?
最後の魔道具 ~武器無しキッドのミッションインポッシブル?~
